personalData.name: MOHAMED KHALLAOUI
personalData.headline: SAP Technical Consultant
personalData.about: Motivated SAP Technical Consultant seeking a PFE/CDI (Jan/Feb 2026). Experienced in SAP S/4HANA, ABAP, RAP, CAP, SAPUI5, SAP Fiori, SAP BTP, with knowledge of SAP MM processes. Skilled in delivering RICEFW objects to solve business challenges. Proactive team player, passionate about delivering real business value.

Hero.welcome: Welcome to my digital space. I build things for the web with passion and precision.

About.title: About Me
About.subtitle: A brief introduction to who I am and what I do.
About.paragraph: Beyond coding, I am passionate about creating intuitive user experiences that are both functional and visually appealing. I believe that great software is built at the intersection of powerful technology and thoughtful design.

Experience.title: Experience
Experience.subtitle: A timeline of my professional journey and accomplishments. Click on an item to see more details.

items.description: Implemented SAP ERP/S/4HANA (On-Prem & Cloud), developing ABAP programs, CDS Views, ABAP RESTful Application Programming Model (RAP) apps, and SAP Fiori UI/UX solutions. Built OData services and SAP BTP integrations; developed Java Spring Boot & Node.js applications with CAP. Applied Keep the Core Clean practices, contributed to agile teamwork, and enhanced SAP BTP connectivity. Collaborated with functional teams to ensure accurate technical specifications.
Built a production management Web App with Spring MVC, Spring Security, Thymeleaf and MySQL to handle production planning, tracking, and reporting, improving operational efficiency.
Created a Library Management System using Java Swing and MySQL to manage book inventory and member records.

items.title: Data Analytics Dashboard
items.description: A web-based dashboard for visualizing and analyzing complex datasets with interactive charts and reports.
